control_attributes.control_description: The information system maintains the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of information during preparation for transmission and during reception.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization produces, controls, and distributes symmetric cryptographic keys using [Selection: NIST FIPS-compliant; NSA-approved] key management technology and processes.

Control Statement: The information system maintains the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of information during preparation for transmission and during reception.
